columns.definition: A unique identifier assigned to each customer in the banking system. This is the primary key that links all customer accounts, transactions, and services.
columns.condition: 8-12 alphanumeric characters, optionally starting with CUST
violations: Contains 1 duplicate values but must be unique

action.issue: This Customer ID already exists in our system. Each customer must have a unique ID.
action.why_required: Without a valid Customer ID, we cannot uniquely identify you in our banking system
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above

columns.definition: The full legal name of the customer as per government-issued identification. Critical for KYC compliance and legal documentation.
columns.condition: 2-100 characters, letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes only

action.message: Customer name is complete and properly formatted
usage: Appears on all official documents (statements, certificates, cards)
Used for KYC verification against government IDs
Required for legal agreements and contracts
action.next_steps: Name will be used for all official correspondence

columns.definition: Customer's age in years. Determines account eligibility, product offerings, and regulatory requirements (minor accounts, senior citizen benefits).

action.message: Age is within acceptable range and verified
usage: Triggers special benefits (senior citizen interest rates)
Required for risk assessment and insurance products
Used for regulatory compliance (minors need guardians)
action.next_steps: Age-appropriate products and services will be offered

columns.definition: Customer's primary contact number for banking alerts, OTPs, and transaction notifications. Critical security parameter for two-factor authentication.
columns.condition: 10-digit number starting with 6-9 (India) or international format

action.message: Phone number is correctly formatted and verified via OTP
usage: OTP for secure login and transaction authorization
action.next_steps: You'll receive all banking alerts on this number

columns.display_note: Sensitive data is masked for security

columns.definition: Customer's email address for official communications, e-statements, and online banking credentials.
violations: 1 values do not match required format: Valid email format (e.g., name@example.com)

action.issue: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., name@example.com).
action.why_required: Needed for e-statements, online banking, and official communications
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above

columns.display_note: Sensitive data is masked for security

columns.definition: A unique identifier for each bank account. Core reference for all transactions, balances, and banking operations.
violations: 1 values do not match required format: 10-16 digits only

action.issue: Account number must be 10-16 digits only.
action.why_required: Account number is the fundamental identifier for all banking operations
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above
blocked_actions: ALL transactions blocked until valid account number assigned

columns.display_note: Sensitive data is masked for security

columns.definition: The category of bank account determining features, benefits, transaction limits, and fees.
violations: Contains invalid values: INVALID_TYPE. Allowed: SAVINGS, CURRENT, SALARY, FIXED_DEPOSIT, RECURRING_DEPOSIT, ZERO_BALANCE, SENIOR_CITIZEN

action.issue: Invalid account type. Please select from: Savings, Current, Salary, Fixed Deposit, Recurring Deposit, Zero Balance, Senior Citizen.
action.why_required: Determines interest rates, fees, and account features
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above

columns.definition: Current operational state of the account, indicating whether transactions are allowed, restricted, or blocked.

usage: FROZEN: All transactions blocked, legal clearance needed
action.next_steps: Transaction rules applied based on status

columns.definition: Current available balance in the account, representing total funds available for transactions.
columns.condition: Numeric value, can be negative for overdraft accounts

action.message: Balance is properly recorded and meets account requirements
usage: Used for minimum balance fee calculation
Interest calculation on average monthly balance

columns.definition: The monetary value of a financial transaction (deposit, withdrawal, transfer).
columns.condition: Positive numeric value, up to 2 decimal places

action.why_required: Amount determines debit/credit value and regulatory compliance
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above

columns.definition: The category of transaction indicating the nature of the operation - debit (outflow) or credit (inflow).
violations: Contains invalid values: INVALID. Allowed: DEBIT, DR, CREDIT, CR, WITHDRAWAL, DEPOSIT, TRANSFER, SALARY, FEE, INTEREST, REVERSAL

action.issue: Invalid transaction type. Use: DEBIT, CREDIT, WITHDRAWAL, DEPOSIT, TRANSFER, SALARY, FEE, INTEREST, or REVERSAL.
action.why_required: Type determines how transaction affects account balance
action.what_to_do: Please correct the issues listed above
